div.p: Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvo die Junij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij

quo die prepositus per decretum curie assignauit macolmo mowet diem veneris proximo futuro ad respondendum super
perturbacione ballivorum / et penes alias actiones sibi impositas per ballivos ad faciendum ipso die et departiendum
vt jura volunt

The xxvj dai of Junij the yer' forsaid / the Aldirman consale and communite of the burgh of Abirdene
gadirit in the tolbuthe of that ilk / be the voce of the belman throu the toune be publike
warning Riply avisit / considiring the vacacione of the chaplanery and service of Sanct ninianis
altar' in the parroche kirk of the said burgh' in faute of service and personale Residence of Sir
Patrick tulloch' vmquhile chaplan of the samen has gefin and grauntit the said chaplanery
til a discrete man Schir' Robert leis chaplan with al comoditeis annuale rentis fredo
mys and offerentis pertening til it / for al the daies of his life / and a presentacione tharupon'
thai haf decretit and ordanit tobe made to the said ser Robert vndir the common seel in
deuly fourme et cetera
xxviij die Junij anno quo supra

In curia tenta in pretorio per prepositum et ballivos quarto die Julij anno predicto prepositus ex deliberacione curie assigna
uit patricio stiklaw ad respondendum plegio porrecto super eum per Alexandrum marr' supra iniusta detencione
nauli suj / crastinum diem hora causarum peremptorie in curia huius burgi cum consensu parcium

vjto die Julij predicto henricus owrum primo die vocatus in curia coram Alexandro rede ballivo ad intrandum Donaldum de
tulch pro quo deuenit plegius ad sectam Dauid galychtly pro iniusta detencione iiijxx pellium ouinarum et vltra / non comparuit

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per Alexandrum rede vnum ballivorum eiusdem octauo
die Julij anno quo supra

The quhilk dai thom of culan was convict be ane sworn assise for the refusing of the kingis
coppir money in selling of meil / And thir ar the names of the assise Dauid symson gilbert
vaus Dauid mathoson alexander the hay John' stevinson Johne of glenmalvin William the hay
alexander nachti Wat of achneve John' malisson androw atkin Johne gregory Johne of torryleth
henry owrum and John' symson And the said thomas in amerciament of the court for the samen caus'

Item the samen dai William moris wif was convict be the said assise for refusing of the said
money and adiugit in amerciament of the court for the said caus'

The ix dai of Julij yer' et cetera lxxxij thom of culan put him in the bailyeis wil of amerciament of
the court / for breking of common' ordinance in selling of meil derrer than the merket stude

Duncanus Wode conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio margrete frostar et tenetur emendare parti
lese ad visum proborum virorum

The xj dai of Julij yer' et cetera lxxxij It is ordanit decretit and deliuerit be the consale and communite
that quhat fleschar' that has stuf or may haf and wil nocht vse his craft for the sustentacion
of the pepil betuix this and settirday that next cumis / and beis convict tharfor be ane assise
salbe expellit fra his craft for yer' and day

Item that quhat browstar' that has nocht alde ail and new and may haf it / that may be
fundin be ane assise salbe expellit fra that office for yer' and day

Item quhat baxtaris that has stuf or may haf it / that wil nocht baik and vse thare craft
for the sustentacion of the communite he beand convict be ane assise tharof / salbe expellit
fra his craft for yer' and dai

Item that al gudis that the kingis blak money is refusit for tobe eschet and thare persons
of the Refusaris tobe punyst eftir the kingis proclamacion / And al blak monee
til haf cours' vnto the tyme it be adnullit be oppin proclamacion of the king vndir
the painis contenit in the kingis proclamacione
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis et annj predictorum

quo die Johannes sclatar in vico castri conuictus per assisam amerciatur perturbio andree stevinson
pro perturbacione et inobediencia philippi Dunbrek et Dauid Duncanj seriandorum facien'
suum officium

Eodem die persone subscripte convicte fuerunt per assisam pro refutacione nigre monete dominj Regis in vendicione ceruisie videlicet
vxor Willelmi malisson / vidua ade cardny vxor andree ancroft vxor Johanne pawdy margreta vaus vxor andree
havdan Johannes talyour with the party hois' vxor alexandri logy vxor bevirlay textoris vxor alexandri wischart ma
riota bol vxor gilberti quhite vxor Johannis Durward marioria mvnk vxor Johannis matland vxor
alexandri alanj henricus quhitbrow vxor Johannis vaus adam crafurd pro filia sua Janeta club Agnes rothi
vxor Roberti Kintor vxor Antonij hatmakar et Janeta smyth

xv die Julij anno quo supra / in curia ballivorum Duncanus de leis pelliparius conuictus
per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione mariorie Relicte quondam Johannis Kymdy et curie af
firmate Insuper assisa reperit quod excessit contra Dauid Duncanj seriandum in verbis maliciosis
et adiudicatur emendare vt Jura volunt Et dicta marioria quilibet de perturbio Duncan leis

The samen dai the assise has deliuerit that thom gledstane sal deliuer twa lewis
of gold til Richart of culan / of the quhilkis he folowit him be a borch / the
said Richart payand tharfor til him xx s' / And for the wrangwis' withhalding of the
said lewis the said thomas was adiugit in amerciament and tocontent the said Richart
within terme of law
Curia tenta in pretorio burgi de Abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxo die mensis et annj predictorum

quo die henricus owrum secundo die vocatus ad intrare faciendum Donaldus de tulch ad sectam
Dauid galichtly per plegium porrectum in manum Duncanj straloch seriandi pro iniusta detencione
iiijxx pellium ouinarum et vltra / non comparuit quare precipitur / dicto seriando capere districtum de dicto
plegio et cetera et premunire eundem ad comparere faciendum dictum Donaldum hodie ad quindenam tanquam ad
tercium diem huius processus

The samen dai before the ballies in Jugement Alexander sanchar' grantit that he becom borgh
til Alexander rede ane of the balyeis for thomas symson / for four' barrellis of salmond acht
til alexander turing burges of edinburgh / of the quhilkis the terme of payment is bypast / til
haf bene pait til the said Alexander turyng or til William quelp his procuratour on his behalf /

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe of the samen the xxiij
dai of July yer' of god et cetera lxxxij Dauid hil and his wif togiddir comperit before the bal
lies and schew to thaim apon the common kyst xx s' of blak money quhilkis William
quelp gerd philp of Dunbrek seriand deliuer til the said Dauid and his wif on friday the
xix day of this instant moneth of Julij on his behalf as for payment of xv inglis
grottis quhilkis the said Dauid lent til the said Wilyam apon a pawnde / And becaus'
the said Dauid allegit that the blak monee was cryit downe before the dai of the
said deliuerance / he offerit thaim agane to the said Wilyam as vnlauchful payment in
presence of the balyeis

The samen dai Sande sclatar was adiugit in amerciament of the court for the wrangwis'
halding of foure stan' of wol fra Robert lorymar' burges of montros as was deli
uerit be ane sworn assise / and tocontent the said Robert or alexander of chamer yongar and
alexander chamer seriand his procuratouris and factouris on his behalf of the said wol within
terme of law

xxiiij die mensis Julij predicto Johannes malissone constituit Robertum blindsele procuratorem suum in omnibus
causis et placitis sibi quoquomodo pertinen' ad defendendum agendum et prosequendum pro se et
nomine suo tanquam ipsemet personaliter interesset cum potestate substituendi si necesse fuerit
vnum uel plures procuratorem vel procuratores in latissima forma procuratorij Necnon
constituit thomam fife alterum procur' ad agendum pro eo constituen' coniunctim et diuisim in forma premissa et cetera
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxvj die Julij anno predicto /

quo die quidam hans esterling et Robertus
huntar quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbio adinuicem in verbis et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum

Item dictus hans conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta capcione vnius barelle bituminis
de domo Roberti blindsele
Robertus prat vocatus xxix die dicti mensis Julij in curia ad respondendum andree murra seniori pro iniusta detencione vnius obligacionis ab eo

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio secundo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxxij Ricardus hil per confessionem
propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta percussione thome strath et tenetur emendare ad visum proborum Et est memorandum quod non comparuit / licet ad hoc fuerat premunitus per a rede ballivum

Eodem die actio mota inter gilbertum de camera et gilbertum riburn penes vnum cingulum
argentum respectuatur vsque ad diem lune inueniente sequen' sub hac condicione / si dicte persone non
sciunt inter se concordare infra hinc et diem lune / tunc dictus gilbertus riburn illo die subiet
determinacionem vnius assise absque aliqua excepcione vtrum debeat deliberare dictum cin
gulum dicto gilberto de camera ex parte vxoris sue aut non et cetera

Eodem die Ricardus hil inuenit Jacobum craik plegium legalem quod thomas strath erit
indempnis pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris et dictus Ricardus promisit comparere die lune proximo
ad subeundum ordinacionem prepositi et consilij penes emendam perturbaconis thome strath
Item henricus owrum deuenit plegius pro thoma strath de indempnitate Ricardi hil vt supra

Item eodem die Dauid spens fatebatur se fideiussorem andree vaus pro gilberto mori
son' pro xij bollis auenarum Ideo precipitur eidem per balliuos ad satisfaciendum aut satisfieri faciendum
dicto andree infra terminum Juris

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem v die Augusti anno
Domini et cetera lxxxij / quo die sectis vocatis et cetera

Eodem die gilbertus morison comparuit in Judicio et optulit se releuare Dauid spens
de fideiussione pro qua deuenit andree vaus penes xij bollas auenarum tanquam
principali debito et dicte summe

Item eodem die iniungitur thome quhite ex deliberacione curie ad respondendum plegio porrecto super
eum per Johannem huchouson pro iniusta detencione xxxix solidorum pro precio xiij corriorum
hodie ad quindenam vt Jura volunt
Willelmus burges amerciatur per concessionem propriam pro infrictione ponderis panis frumenti non bonj

The same dai philp of Dunbrek and his wif war made quyte be ane assise
of the clame of Symond lindesay of xlvij s' for the price of ij bollis of maltis

Item the samen dai canne rothi quyte be the said assise of Symon lindesais clame
of vj s' iij d' for j f' of malt

vj die Augusti predicto In curia ballivorum alexander fyndlaw conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento
quia iniuste perturbavit patricium baxtar et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum
Et patricius baxtar amerciatur pro perturbio dictj alexandri in verbo et tenetur emendare ut supra

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the vij dai of August
yer' forsaid / Dauid symson John' the vaus thom prat androw culan gilbert morisoune
James craik John' glenmalvin adam andirson Johne echtsy and James andirson chosin
and sworn in ane assise anent the debate betuix hans and matheus estirlingis of
certane blak monee ressauit be the said hans to the vse of thaim baith ./ Riply
avisyt decretis and deliueris / that the tynsale of the said blak money salbe departit
betuix thame pund pund like eftir as thai had of gudis

The ix dai of August forsaid In the tolbuthe before the aldirman the debate betuix the
lard of achintoule and gilbert morison' anent the said lardis clame of certane monee exten
dand til the some' of xxiiij s' as he sayd :/ was put til certane sworn persons chosin as
in assise with consent of parties ./ the quhilk assise deliuerit and referrit the declaracion of the said
debate and clame til the said gilbertis aith / the quhilk aith he made in fourm of thare de
liuerance And swa is the said gilbert fundin quyte of the lard of achintoulis clame forsaid
Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die Augusti anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij

quo die Iniungitur Willelmo cadiou et Dauid spens ex decreto curie ad respondendum die ven mercurij
proximo futuro tanquam in curia de pipuldrus' super plegiis porrectis per fyndelaum fores videlicet
super dictum Willelmum pro iniusta detencione vij s' g' et super dictum Dauid pro vna olla erea
prout voluerint perdere seu lucrari

Assisa Robertus blindsel Dauid symson Jacobus cuming thomas prat Willelmus blindsel Willelmus Kintor
Jacobus craik gilbertus morison gilbertus leche / quj Jurati et inter se auisati continuaverunt causam et
actionem motas inter Alexandrum menyes et andream culan de et super x librarum et iiij s' clamati per
estirling' vsque diem mercurij xiiijtum diem instantis mensis

xiijo die mensis augusti predicti Dauid howy inuenit Robertum blindsel plegium legalem pro eo quod andreas
branch erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris / et quod comparebit crastina die ad subeundum assisam pro
perturbio dicti andree / Et andreas lammynton' deuenit plegius eodemmodo pro andrea branch de indempnitate
Dauid howy quodque comparebit responsurus et Juri periturus pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Dauid ut premittitur
Insuper dicte partes premuniuntur per prepositum ad subeundum detencionem assise crastina die super debata inter
easdem penes assedacionem aque de le pot

The samen dai It was fundin be ane sworn assise and deliuerit be John' the vaus forspekar
of the samyn / that alexander martyne suld content and pay til androw lowson xvj s' of vsuale monee
becaus' it was na sufficient payment that he had gevin til the said androw for it was
in blak money deliuerit eftir the downe crying of the samyn

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio de abirdene xiiij die augusti anno predicto Mariota logan
constituit thomam fife suum procuratorem ad prosequendum actionem suam aduersus Willelmum andree pro iniusta detencione
certe summe monete ab eadem in forma Juris

The samen dai the assise aboue nemmyt togiddir with thomas fife alexander howison Johne ste
vinson Robert prat and Wat achneve addit and sworn to the samyn assise / Riply avisit
fand and deliuerit be James coming forspekar of the assise / that Alexander menyes suld content
and pay the balyeis of this burgh in the fremmyt menis name / the sowme that he
is awand for thare gudis

The wif of androw murray yongar convict be ane assise is adiugit in amerciament for breking of
common ordinance in ressetting of meil within hir hous' vnpresent to the merket beand tappit and
sauld in the samyn hous'

marion' of buchan put hir in wil of the aldirman and balyeis of breking of pais' of brede
Wil of buchan in amerciament becaus' he had stuf and wald nocht baik toserve the toun
Wil sprunt in amerciament for selling of brede for iij d' ob'
Duncan baxtar for selling of brede for iij d ob'
Cristian layng for selling of a laif for iiij d' atour common' ordinance

Item the samen dai It was ordanit be the assise that Dauid spens suld deliuer til fyndlaw fores
j brassyn pot and he is in amerciament for the wrangwis halding of the samyn

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin in the tolbuthe of that ilk the xvj dai of august
yer' of god et cetera lxxxij the action of xlv s' clamyt be John' of panton of petmethen and
his wif fra Johne talyour for the price of v eln' of clath and demj was put til a sworn
assise the quhilk riply avisit / deliuerit / that gif the said John' talyour wald swere the
gret bodely aith that he gudit him nocht with the money ressavit for the clath and / that he
ressauit na siluer tharfor bot blak monee and had it evir redy lyand with him til
haf gevin til the said Johne of pantonis wif of til hir factouris / the said aith be
and sworn . thai fand the said John' talyour quyte of thare clame forsaid / the quhilk
aith he made incontinent in presence of the party eftir the fourm of the deliuerence of the assise pronun
cit be androw branch forspekar of the assise / and swa is he quite of the clame of the
forsaid some' except ij s' quhilkis he is ordanit to pay in quhite siluer that he
disponit of the said some' be his awn' graunt /

The samen dai John' of tulidef the son' of quhilum alexander tulidef and ayr' of vmquhile John' of
tulidef burges of abirdene his grantschir' and of marion' strang his grandame comperand be
for the aldirman and ballies in Jugement has made constitute and ordanit William of tulidef burges
of the said burgh his verray lachful and vnreuocabil procuratour actour and factour' til ask resaue
recovir and optene for him and in his name al and sundry gudis and dettis pertening til him herita
bly or vthirwais in quhaissumeuir handis thai be And gif nede be tocompel and persew the with
haldaris of the said gudis and dettis be censuris of halykirk and vthirwais as law wil / promit
tand tohald ferm and stable be the fath of his body quhatsumeuir thing the said his procuratour
and factour' lachfully ledis tobe done in his name
Curia tenta per ballivos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xvij die mensis Augusti predicti /

quo die coram
preposito et ballivis Willelmus cadiou obligatur fide media ad persoluendum Dauid spens x s'
in quibus sibi tenetur ad terminos subsequentes videlicet v s' ad festum beati martinj in hieme proximo futuro
et v s' est ad festum pentecostes immediate inde sequens absque vlterori dilacione

The samyn dai the action and caus' movit betuix John' of culan and matheus eggard
merchand of Danskin anent the peroffering and payment of xij li' of blak money perof
ferit be androw culan brothir and factour in that part to the said John' to the said matheus / was
put to the determinacion of ane assise of thir persons Thomas fife androw branche
Wilyam blindsel gilbert morison James craik John' the vaus William moore
androw murray yongar Wilyam tulidef William Kyntor and John glenmalvin / quhilkis the
gret aith sworn and riply avisit fand and deliuerit be thomas fife forspekar / that the
peroffering of the said xij li' suld stand in na payment to the merchandis becaus'
it was nocht perofferit to the principale merchand that sald the gude to the ton' / and thai
fand that the said androw was na factour til his bruthir

Item the said dai the aldirman balyeis consale and communite present for the tym has ordanit that
Johne of Kyntor and William of Kintor his sone' sal pay til Richart maistir masoune
of the kirk wark foure pundis acht be thaim to the toune / for thare gressom of ane
half net of Done / for the cure of the wark / the aldirman ballies consel and communite forsaid
oblisand thaim tokepe the said John' and William scathles anent the payment of the said some'
for evir

Item the same dai the assise forsaid ordanit and deliuerit that mage scherar' suld pay
til a man of the lard of Johnestonis xxxvij s' of quhite siluer and vj d' that is tosay the
inglis grote for ija s' the scottis grote with the croune for xxij d' and the scottis spurrit grot
for xvj d' for malt bocht be hir fra the said men

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xixno die Augusti anno
Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

The samen dai the ballies assignit til adam of crafurd in the name of margret his dochtir
this dai xv dais peremptourly to preve with sufficient witnes / that his said doghtir perofferit
til marion' the spous of vmquhile Richart Kintor xv s' of blak money quhilk
was lauchful payment in that tym of hir peroffir' for the price of demj bol of malt acht
til the said marion' / And falyeand of the said preif / the said margret tobe dettour of the some'

Eodem die thomas quhite primo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis huchonson pro detencione xxxix solidorum pro
precio xiij corriorum / non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum et cetera et
premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

The said dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise thomas fife forspekar / that the
vj li' perofferit be gilbert morison til androw vaus was na payment

Item the same dai anent the debate betuix hans and matheus estirlingis the said assise riply
avisit determinit and declarit / that anent the some' of blak money ressavit be the said
hans that suld haf bene departit betuix thaim pund pund like / gif it be swa de
partit it sal stand / and gif it be nocht / it sal be yit departit as it was ordanit of before
And anent the clame of forbettiring of certane crownys for the said matheus estland
burdis that is referrit to the sterismanis cuming / and thai fynd the said matheus
hyre and furing awing til him and his costis sen he was forbodin the schippis cost

In curia tenta in pretorio per Johannem Wormot vnum ballivorum de abirdene xxo die mensis predicti
Willelmus modan per confessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione domini Johannis
striuelyne capellanj et tenetur emendare eidem ad visum proborum virorum et cetera

The same dai comperit before the balye forsaid in Jugement fynlaw fores and oblisit him
til releve and kepe scathles William cadiow of a barrel of saip in sa fer as the said Wil
liam makis payment or sustenis scath anent Johne balye or his procuratouris for the
said barel of saip beand lauchfully optenyt apon the said Wilyam The quhilk todo
the said fynlau is oblist as said is be his hand and gudis

xxvj die Augusti anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij / coram ballivis in pretorio Andreas vaus constituit Alexandrum rede
andream branche et dominum Dauid vaus curatum de abirdene suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim
in causa inter eum et thomam gledstane mota / et in omnibus aliis actionibus ipsum concernentibus Ipso promittens
de Rato cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die comparens in Judicio Johanne culan vno ballivorum / Si et in quantum alias adiudicatus
fuit per assisam in summa octo librarum soluend' mercatoribus de trailsownd pro suo interesse bo
norum eorundem / protestatus fuit ad prosequendum alios ballivos suos complices pro parte dicte summe
et quod huiusmodi solucio per eum facta non cedet sibi in dampnum / quin possit alios prosequj
balliuos quoniam et vbi tempus fuerit oportunum

Item eodem die actio mota inter gilbertum Waus de many et thomam gledstane penes
quatuor marcas clamat' per dictum gilbertum posita fuit ad assisam /. que matura auisa
ta deliberauit et decreuit dictum thomam quitum de clamio dicti gilberti summe antedicte
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem xxvij die mensis Augusti predicti /

quo die
actio mota per hans cunnart magistrum ac mercatorem cuiusdam nauis de Danskin de et
super certis summis clamatis per eundem hans ab Alexandro de camera Roberto blindsel et thoma
prat tanquam mercatoribus et emptoribus bonorum suorum / posita fuit ad assisam proborum virorum
ad hoc iuratorum quorum nomina sunt hoc Duncanus sanchar de murcroft thoma fife Jacobus cuming
gilbertus vaus Willelmus blindsel andreas branch Dauid mathei gilbertus morison et
andreas atkin / Quj mature auisati deliberarunt quod dicti alexander Robertus et thomas non fuerunt
mercatores neque emptores dictorum bonorum pertinencium ad le hans / nec debent sibi aliquam
summam per ipsum clamatam

Eodem die predictus hans cunnart coram ballivis in Judicio fatebatur se plenarie contentum et persolutum
pro bonis suis emptis et receptis per Alexandrum chavmer de murchil et inde quiteclamauit eundem imperpetuum

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem secundo die Septembris
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxijdo

The quhilk dai Duncan sanchar' of murcroft forspekar for margret the dochtir of adam of
crafurd protestit / that quhat thing hir fadir did in hir name in the action betuix
hir and the spous' of vmquhile Richart Kintor anent xv s' clamyt be hir as
is contenit in ane act / made tharupon suld turn' hir to na preiudice sen hir'
fadir had na power tobe procuratour todo for hir in the said caus'

xvjto die Septembris anno Dominj et cetera lxxxij Johannes chavmer burgensis de elgyne coram preposito et
Alexandro rede vno ballivorum de abirdene constituit magistrum Kennacum suthirland suum procuratorem
cum potestate substituend' in omnibus causis ipsum concernentibus Et signanter ad prosequendum legittime actionem
suam aduersus Duncanum talyour Johannem symson et Alexandrum chavmer seriandum penes certas pecuniarum
summas sibi ut asserit debitas / Et promisit de Rato de Judicio cisti et Judicat' soluj et cetera
Testibus domino Johanne striuelin capellano notario publico Johanne menyes et diuersis aliis

The xviij day of September the yer' of god jM iiijC lxxxij In the tolbuthe of the
burgh of abirden before Dauid menyes ane of the ballies of the samyn Duncan
smyth has set and tomail lattin til a worschipful man Dauid symson' burges of
the said burgh his thrid part of a nettis fisching of the wattir of Done quhilk
the said Duncan has be assignacion of thomas symson' for al his termys :/ the
quhilk thrid part / the said Duncan has set til the said Dauid symson' as said
is / for al and hail the termes of aucht yeris next tocum / the said Dauid payand
the mail to the toune / of the quhilkis termys of aucht yeris the said Duncan grantis
him fullely content and pait ./ And gif it plesis the said Duncan tilhaf the said
wattir for thre barellis of salmond yerly for the saidis viij yeris tobe payt
to the said Dauid and to discharge the said Dauid of the mail to the toune / the
said Duncan salhaf it before ony vtheris ./ witnez . heirof Johne smyth androw
symson' Johne brogane . and patrik badenach' the son'

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene the xx day of September yer' forsaid Wil
liam quelp procurator til vmquhile Alexander turing burges of edinburgh . grantit him fulle
ly content and pait be the handis of Thomas Symsone burges of abirdene of aucht barrel
lis of salmond acht be the said thomas to the said alexander the quhilkis viij barellis
the said William grantit him tilhaf ressauyt as procuratour til the said Alexander at the
feist of Sanct Johne the baptist callit mydsummir last bypast / eftir the tenour of
the first act / made betuix the said alexander and thomas tharupon' / Of the quhilkis viij
barellis the said William procuratour forsaid quytclamyt and dischargit the said
thomas his ayris executouris and assignais now and for evyr before thir witnes
James lesly aldirman alexander rede balye androw branch thomas of marr henry morty
mar' ser Robert leis and ser John' striuelin notaris with vthiris sindry

The samen day in Jugement comperit matheus eggard merchand of Danskyn and
grantit him tilhaf ressauit fra Alexander rede ane of the balyeis of this burgh
twa barrellis of salmond for fyve pundis in part of payment of of a gretar
some' acht for certane gudis bocht fra hans couvert maistir of a schip cal
lit mary knycht of Danskin at the command of the said hans skippar'

Item hans / stereman of the said schip grantis him tilhaf ressauit ane barrel
of salmond fra the said alexander rede for fifty s' in part of payment of the said
gudis bocht fra the said hans skippar and of his command et cetera

Eodem die quidam patricius conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta abductione focalium
patricij badenagh et tenetur emendare dampnum vt Jura volunt
Curia tenta per ballivos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die Septembris anno et cetera lxxxij ./

The quhilk dai Robert brekach tuke topreve this dai xv dais in the court of
this burgh / that Dauid robertson is pait of xj s' vj d' clamyt fra him be the said
Dauid / and falyeand of his preif that day tobe dettour of the said some and topay
it the samen dai to the said Dauid or his procuratouris or deputis ane or ma ./ borch
tharfor patrik badenach And the said Dauid has constitute his wif and John' the
Waus coniunctly and seueralie his procuratouris and deputis in his absence for this action et cetera

Item the samen dai the assise ordanit that Robert club sal fynd souerty topay til alexander
of marr' ten s' for his part of the taxt . assignit til the said alexander / within terme of law .

vltimo die septembris anno quo supra Alexander Irvin de Drum constituit dominum Johannem de camera cappellanum
suum procuratorem ad prosequendum legittime per processus et ad recuperandum quandum terram vastam Jacentem in li scule
hil inter terram Sancti Johannis Jerosolomitanj ex parte orientali et terram quondam domini Johannis de Kynloch
nunc sancti ninianj ex parte occidentali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus duarum marcarum
eidem domino de Drum annuatim debit' hereditate de dicta terra et a longo tempore non solut'
in latissima forma procuratorie et cetera
